main event: Several UFO sightings were reported in the vicinity of Ft. Monmouth, N.J. in 1954, 1958, and 1959, including sightings of fast-moving, bluish objects observed on radar and erratic movements of disk-like objects in the sky.
interesting points: The UFO sightings were documented by military personnel and a civilian witness, indicating multiple credible observers.
One report described a metallic, disk-like object reflecting sunlight and moving erratically across the sky.
Weather and wind conditions at the time of sightings were documented, ruling out natural phenomena such as storms or unusual wind patterns as explanations for the sightings.
The UFO sightings involved objects of various sizes, shapes, and colors, including whitish blue and orange, and were observed at different altitudes and flight paths.
One report described a woman driving along a road and encountering a 20 x 30 foot oblong shaped object hovering over the road at an altitude of about 500 feet.
sighted object: fast-moving, bluish objects observed on radar and erratic movements of disk-like objects in the sky
